job_title: Sr. Java Developer with MongoDB exp

secondary: Excellent written and verbal communication skills
all: Excellent written and verbal communication skills

jd: Hello Folks, (Prefer local to CA who can share CA state ID/ DL copy) - Note it AND Must have strong exp with springboot, Microservices, AWS & MongoDB skillsHope you all are doing good.Please go through the Job description and let me know your interest. Title: Senior Java Developer with MongoDB expWork Location: Woodland hills, CA (Day 1 Onsite) Duration: Long Term ContractMust have: Java, Web Services, AWS Cloud, MongodbExperience: • Responsible for developing architecture frameworks using JEE technologies,• Maintain and improve existing applications,• Assist in the development of standards, procedures and guidelines to improve the development process , Agile SCRUM delivery methodology,• Collaborate with other developers, business analysts and architects to plan, design, develop the JEE based applications and Micro services using Spring Boot• Create and maintain comprehensive project documentation• Meet with clients to take detailed ordering briefs and clarify specific requirements of each project• Delegate project tasks based on junior staff members' individual strengths, skill sets and experience levels• Perform other related duties as assigned• Develop spreadsheets, diagrams and process maps to document needs.Requirements:*Bachelor’s degree with 10 plus years’ experience in project management*Understanding of Agile methodology and execution of Agile project*Excellent written and verbal communication skills*Solid organizational skills including attention to detail and multi-tasking skills.• application development exp in Java 7/8, Spring Framework,Spring Boot following industry recognized software development life cycle- • Experience with designing and developing micro services Restful based applications, Java 7, Java 8, functional aspects, Spring Framework • It is important that the resources are familiar with the current Spring platform and its capabilities, Spring Boot, Spring Integration Spring Data, Swagger, Tomcat 8, Maven, Jenkins, SVN, Git, Mountebank, Postman/Newman.
